mapper.insert: insert into base_parameters (p_id, name, key_code, value, default_value, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name) values (#{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update base_parameters set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_code = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_value = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_mark = #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_parameters
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_code = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default_value = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER},

create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select p_id, name, key_code, value, default_value, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name from base_parameters where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark = 0

select p_id, name, key_code, value, default_value, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name from base_parameters where key_code = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark = 0

select p_id, name, key_code, value, default_value, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name from base_parameters where delete_mark = 0

select count(0) from base_parameters where 1=1
and name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and key_code like concat('%',#{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select p_id, name, key_code, value, default_value, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name from base_parameters where 1=1
and name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and key_code like concat('%',#{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by create_date desc
limit #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
